edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.servers.standardizerserver
Class StandardizerServerConfig

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.servers.standardizerserver.StandardizerServerConfig

 class StandardizerServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object

The server configuration manager.

Reads the properties file "standardizer.config" in the server directory.
